snippet: When Karl-Anthony Towns heads out in the Twin Cities, he drives a vehicle with big, red rims on it. He also likes to wear a bright orange winter coat....
lead_paragraph: When Karl-Anthony Towns heads out in the Twin Cities, he drives a vehicle with big, red rims on it. He also likes to wear a bright orange winter coat.

headline.main: Towns Acclimates to New League, New Life in Minnesota
headline.print_headline: Towns Acclimates to New League, New Life in Minnesota
